tu.note: IMPORTANT: Native transcription of the language (e.g. Dansk, Deutsch, English). IMPORTANT: "English" should not be just translated! IMPORTANT: If the rest of the xml:lang attribute is left with the value "en", it's crucial to update the one of this entry with the correct value (e.g. fr, it, zh_CN, etc.).

tu.note: Piece of text inserted at the end of all short messages

tuv.seg: |Additional information: AnotherSocialEconomy.com. Report issues at: support@anothersocialeconomy.com.

tu.note: Piece of text inserted at the end of all short messages

tuv.seg: |Additional information: ezToff.com. Report issues at: support@ezToff.com. ezToff.com is a member of AnotherSocialEconomy.com.

tu.note: Piece of text inserted at the end of all long messages

seg.p:
--
Please see our terms, privacy policy and don't forget, you can always email Support. In the meantime, thanks for buying locally with AnotherSocialEconomy.com, a member of AnotherSocialEconomy.com.

tu.note: Piece of text inserted at the end of all long messages

seg.p:
--
Please see our terms, privacy policy and don't forget, you can always email Support. In the meantime, thanks for booking locally with ezToff, a member of AnotherSocialEconomy.com.

tu.note: Message subject of all long messages| {demand>key}: identifier of the processed demand

tuv.seg: AnotherSocialEconomy notification about request: {demand>key}

tu.note: Message subject of all long messages| {demand>key}: identifier of the processed demand

tuv.seg: ezToff notification about request: {demand>key}

tu.note: Piece of text inserted at the end of all short pre-formatted commands

tuv.seg: |--|This command will be sent to AnotherSocialEconomy's automated command parser.
cancel demand:{demand>key} {command>footer}
close demand:{demand>key} {command>footer}
propose demand:{demand>key} qty:{demand>quantity} unit-price:? total-cost:? due-date:{demand>dueDate} tags:{demand>criteria} metadata:{demand>metadata}
cancel proposal:{proposal>key} {command>footer}
confirm proposal:{proposal>key} {command>footer}
decline proposal:{proposal>key} {command>footer}
close proposal:{proposal>key} {command>footer}

tuv.seg: FYI: You have been CC'ed by {demand>owner>name} regarding the following Demand creation ...| {demand>key} tags:{demand>criteria} {demand>hashTags} metadata:{demand>metadata} quantity:{demand>quantity} due-date:{demand>dueDate}.

Can you supply {demand>key} tags:{demand>criteria} {demand>hashTags} metadata:{demand>metadata} quantity:{demand>quantity} due-date:{demand>dueDate}?| If yes then replace the "?" and send the following: 'propose demand:{demand>key} tags:? unit-price:? total-cost:? due-date:{demand>dueDate}'.

FYI. Can you supply {demand>key} tags:{demand>criteria} {demand>hashTags} metadata:{demand>metadata} players:{demand>quantity} tee-time:{demand>dueDate}?| If yes then replace the "?" and send the following: 'propose demand:{demand>key} tags:? metadata:{demand>metadata} round-price:? total-cost:? tee-time:{demand>dueDate}'.

Message informing the demand owner about the proposal confirmation.| {0}: demand owner name (can be just the name, just an email address, a combination of both, a twitter id, etc.) {1}: proposal reference {2}: demand reference {3}: proposal due date in the format "EEEE, MMMM d, yyyy at h:mm ap" {4}: proposal quantity {5}: proposal tags {6}: proposal hashtags {7}: currency sign {8}: unit price (9}: total price {10}: store reference {11}: store name {12}: store address {13}: store website {14}: store phone number {15}: store postal code {16}: store country code {17}: email thread subject {18}: content of the automatic response to cancel the demand, as defined by yhe entry "long_golf_demand_cancelCommand" {19}: content of the automatic response to close the demand, as defined by the entry "long_golf_demand_closeCommand" {20}: message footer as defined by the entry "long_golf_footer" {21}: number of pull cart proposed {22}: number of golf cart proposed

Message informing the cc'ed about a proposal confirmation.| {0}: demand owner name (can be just the name, just an email address, a combination of both, a twitter id, etc.) {1}: proposal reference {2}: demand reference {3}: proposal due date in the format "EEEE, MMMM d, yyyy at h:mm ap" {4}: proposal quantity {5}: proposal tags {6}: proposal hashtags {7}: currency sign {8}: unit price (9}: total price {10}: store reference {11}: store name {12}: store address {13}: store website {14}: store phone number {15}: store postal code {16}: store country code {17}: not possible {18}: not possible {19}: not possible {20}: message footer as defined by the entry "long_golf_footer" {21}: number of pull cart proposed {22}: number of golf cart proposed

Message informing the proposal owner about a proposal confirmation.| {0}: proposal owner name (can be just the name, just an email address, a combination of both, a twitter id, etc.) {1}: proposal reference {2}: demand reference {3}: proposal due date in the format "EEEE, MMMM d, yyyy at h:mm ap" {4}: proposal quantity {5}: proposal tags {6}: proposal hashtags {7}: currency sign {8}: unit price (9}: total price {10}: store reference {11}: store name {12}: store address {13}: store website {14}: store phone number {15}: store postal code {16}: store country code {17}: email thread subject {18}: content of the automatic response to cancel the proposal, as defined by yhe entry "long_golf_proposal_cancelCommand" {19}: content of the automatic response to close the proposal, as defined by the entry "long_golf_proposal_closeCommand" {20}: message footer as defined by the entry "long_golf_footer" {21}: number of pull cart proposed {22}: number of golf cart proposed

Message confirming the demand closing.| {0}: owner name {1}: demand key {2}: demand state {3}: demand due date {4}: demand modification date {5}: demand quantity {6}: demand tag list {7}: demand hash tag list {8}: demand CC'ed user list {9}: proposal key {10}: proposal demand key {11}: proposal due date {12}: proposal quantity {13}: proposal tag list {14}: proposal hash tag list {15}: proposal currency {16}: proposal unit price {17}: proposal total cost {18}: demand location postal code {19}: demand location country code {20}: mail message subject for the embedded command {21}: mail message body for the "close proposal" command {22}: message footer {23}: number of pull carts {24}: number of golf carts

tuv.seg:
Hi {0},
The reservation under ezToff Proposal# {9} has been closed. We'll be updating your Rating shortly.
If you enjoyed using ezToff, please recommend us to your fellow golfers, or, simply CC them next time. {22}
Reference#: {1}.
